zh.doc.DingTalk.214687-3: 通知模板结合通知配置为告警消息通知提供支撑。通知模板只能调用同一类型的通知配置服务。
zh.doc.DingTalk.214687-4: 使用钉钉消息通知时需在钉钉开放平台中创建好对应的应用
zh.doc.DingTalk.214687-7: 使用固定的通知配置发送此通知模板
zh.doc.DingTalk.214687-9: 获取路径：“钉钉开放平台”--“应用开发”--“查看应用”
zh.doc.DingTalk.214687-11: 若不填写收信人，则在模板调试和配置告警通知时手动填写。
zh.doc.DingTalk.214687-13: 支持填写带变量的动态模板。变量填写规范示例：{0}。填写动态参数后，可对变量的名称、类型、格式进行配置，以便告警通知时填写。

en.doc.DingTalk.214687-3: The notification template combined with notification configuration provides support for alarm message notifications. Notification templates can only call notification configuration services of the same type.
en.doc.DingTalk.214687-4: When using DingTalk message notifications, it is necessary to create corresponding applications in the DingTalk open platform
en.doc.DingTalk.214687-7: Send this notification template using a fixed notification configuration
en.doc.DingTalk.214687-9: Access path: "DingTalk Open Platform" - "Application Development" - "View Application"
en.doc.DingTalk.214687-11: If the recipient is not specified, it will be manually filled in during template debugging and alarm notification configuration.
en.doc.DingTalk.214687-13: Support filling in dynamic templates with variables. Example of variable filling standard: {0}. After filling in the dynamic parameters, the name, type, and format of the variables can be configured for filling in during alarm notifications.
